column5: We actively live in our home and invite you to do so as well. Use the house and make it yours. Our home is a traditional 2-story home. This bedroom with two twin beds is on the second floor, fourteen steps up. Many of our rooms have color. This bedroom is pink and sleeps two people. Another bedroom is blue and has a queen bed. It can be reserved on another listing. The colors are tactful and tastefully done. The neighborhood is very well taken care. This is beautiful place to stay.
column8: 2 Twin Sleeps 2 NE Houston 20 Minutes from Bush
